options.text: We fully understand the relationship between food and microbiomes

options.label: B
options.text: We see positive correlations, but more research is needed

options.label: C
options.text: We know that only certain foods are beneficial

options.label: D
options.text: We know that all foods are beneficial

multiple-choice.question: What can individuals do to promote a healthy gut microbiome?

options.label: A
options.text: Eat a diet high in processed foods

options.label: B
options.text: Fill up on fibers, fresh and fermented foods

options.label: C
options.text: Take antibiotics regularly

options.label: D
options.text: Avoid eating fruits and vegetables
